content.question: The Brazilian government’s pride in listing the extensive workers’ rights guaranteed under the 1937 constitution is significant because it shows that

choices.label: governments across the political spectrum sought the support of the military in obtaining political power
governments across the political spectrum were influenced by socialist economic and social policies
governments across the political spectrum used nationalism to mobilize their populations for war
governments across the political spectrum promoted state-led industrialization to foster economic growth

content.answer: governments across the political spectrum were influenced by socialist economic and social policies
